body:
`clingo` needs a patch for versions 5.4 and 5.3 due to compilation errors:  
 - https://github.com/potassco/clingo/issues/244
- https://github.com/potassco/clingo/pull/167

Discovered while trying this PR out: https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/19501 .
title: clingo: compilation error - needs a patch
